item.title: All Active Genshin Impact Redeem Codes (June 2024)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • Genshin Impact Redeem Codes (June 2024)
  • How To Redeem Genshin Impact Codes
  • Primogems In Genshin Impact

Primogem is the primary resource Genshin Impact players would need to get new characters and weapons. The easiest way to get this currency is obviously by spending money to buy Genesis Crystals and convert them into Primogems, but the most affordable way is by being active, following every in-game event, and, of course, hunting additional Primogems from web events or codes.

Some redemption codes are released at a fixed interval. For instance, three livestream codes are always announced every six weeks, and new redeem codes are available at the start of every version. If players are wondering which Genshin Impact redeem codes are currently available, they can refer to this article.

Genshin Impact Redeem Codes (June 2024)

Here are all the Genshin redeem codes for June 2024:

  • FBJCMYSXCBT5 - 60 Primogems & 5 Adventurer's Experience
  • RTJUNRSHTAL9 - 60 Primogems & 5 Adventurer's Experience
  • GENSHINGIFT - 50 Primogems & 3 Hero's Wit

Expired Codes

Unfortunately, due to them being time-limited, the following codes are no longer available.

  • DSXY15NL247E - 10k Mora, 10 Adventurer's Experience, 5 Fine Enhancement Ore, 5 Stir-Fried Fish Noodles, 5 Jueyun Chili Chicken
  • ULEP3495428K - 10k Mora, 10 Adventurer's Experience, 5 Fine Enhancement Ore, 5 Stir-Fried Fish Noodles, 5 Jueyun Chili Chicken
  • PZFUH5GIP9UF - 10k Mora, 10 Adventurer's Experience, 5 Fine Enhancement Ore, 5 Stir-Fried Fish Noodles, 5 Jueyun Chili Chicken
  • XQECMR9IIJ46 - 10k Mora, 10 Adventurer's Experience, 5 Fine Enhancement Ore, 5 Stir-Fried Fish Noodles, 5 Jueyun Chili Chicken

How To Redeem Genshin Impact Codes

There are several ways players can redeem Genshin Impact codes:

  1. Visit the official website https://genshin.hoyoverse.com/en/gift
  2. Use the redeem codes button from the in-game setting

Method 1

For the first method, visit the official website, then do the following:

  1. Log in to the HoYoverse account that matches the target Genshin account
  2. Select the appropriate server that contains a profile
  3. Paste the code in the Redemption code box, or simply press on the provided link, and this box will be filled automatically
  4. Press redeem

Method 2

For the second method, open Genshin Impact , and once it loads, follow these steps:

  1. Go to Paimon’s menu
  2. Press Settings
  3. Go to Account
  4. Choose Redeem Code
  5. Input the available Genshin Impact redeem code
  6. Press Exchange

Primogems In Genshin Impact

Primogems can be used for several things, but players commonly spend it on wishing banners to get the characters or weapons that they want. Other than this, the currency can also be used to recharge Original Resin or buy Battle Pass level . Each Battle Pass level costs 150 Primogems, and will stay at this rate even if players buy 50 levels at once. Meanwhile, Original Resin recharge gets more expensive over time and is capped at six times per day.

Daily Refill Primogem Cost
1 50
2-3 100
4 150
5-6 200

Each refill will grant 60 Resin, so in total, players can get 360 Resin at the cost of 800 Primogems.

To get Primogems in Genshin Impact , the most reliable and affordable source is the Daily Commission and Welkin subscription. However, other sources like Spiral Abyss, Genesis Crystals, Battle Pass, Events, Adventure Rank rewards, achievements, and HoYoLAB check-in are also available.

item.title: Planet Coaster: How to Keep Staff Happy
item.description:
Planet Coaster is an exhilarating construction game where you get the chance to construct and manage a theme park, full of exhilarating rides. As the overseer of your park, your main goal is to expand it until it becomes your own version of Disneyland.

However, on your journey to become a tycoon, you may encounter a challenge: your park staff becoming bored and unhappy. This could be a major setback because your staff members are the cornerstone of your theme park. Without them, even the most thrilling rides wouldn't create a successful park. But do not worry, this guide will assist you in making your staff happy in Planet Coaster .

How to Keep Staff Happy

Maintaining staff happiness is crucial if you want to keep your theme park running smoothly. Over time, you will see your staff becoming bored and unhappy. That can become a problem for you. If their happiness scores drop too low, they might consider resigning and disrupting the operations of your park. Luckily, there are a few ways through which you can increase their happiness.

Balance Your Staff Number

To keep your staff happy, it's necessary to maintain the right balance in their workload. Make sure that you have enough staff to keep your park running . At the same time, try not to overstuff your park, as this can lead to boredom and other issues.

Build Staff Buildings

Make sure your staff is well-rested by providing adequate staff buildings for breaks. Each staff building will help you accommodate three staff members, and when upgraded, it can manage ten.

Don't overlook the perks of these buildings, as they can increase your staff’s morale and productivity. There are many perks you can choose from according to the specific needs of your staff members, such as healthcare, learning resources, or others.

Train Your Staff Members

Train your staff frequently to ensure that they are capable of managing the growing number of guests as your park grows in size and popularity. However, avoid overtraining them, as they may become bored if there aren’t enough guests to keep them busy.

Assign Your Staff

When your park has grown to an enormous size, focus on utilizing work rosters to assign specific areas of your park to staff members. This will reduce their need to constantly move around.

Manage Their Salaries

Make sure to adjust your staff's salaries as they undergo training and handle higher workloads. At the start, they will agree to work on a normal salary, but as your park expands and their workload increases, it is essential to compensate them appropriately for their efforts.

item.title: Pokemon GO: Mythical, Legendary, And Mega Raid Schedule (June 2024)
item.description:
Pokemon GO features different Mythical, Legendary, and Mega Pokemon as raid bosses. While such monsters already possess amazing capabilities, coming as raid bosses can boost their prowess even further. Winning such raids can reward you with Shiny encounters.

Pokemon GO developers at Niantic significantly boost the Combat Power (CP) of raid bosses, making it extremely challenging to defeat them. Also, since most of these monsters are legendaries, their Shiny counterparts are extremely rare. While preparing proper counters against them is extremely important, trainers must stay updated on the dates and times these raids are set. That said, this guide explores all the Mythical, Legendary, and Mega raids with their exact date and time for June 2024.

Pokemon GO: Mythical, Legendary, And Mega Raid Schedule For June 2024

Pokemon GO also offers Elite and Shadow Raids with the Mythical, Legendary, and Mega Raid battles. In addition, you can participate in specific raid hours; these raid hours run for a particular amount of time and offer numerous legendary encounters.

Mega Gyarados in Mega Raids

Mega Gyarados Raids

Starts

Saturday, June 1, at 10 AM Local Time

Ends

Monday, June 10, at 10 AM Local Time

Shiny Availability

Shiny Gyarados and Shiny Mega Gyarados are available

Zapdos in 5-Star Raids

Zapdos Raids

Starts

Saturday, June 1, at 10 AM Local Time

Ends

Monday, June 10, at 10 AM Local Time

Shiny Availability

Shiny Zapdos is available

Raid Hours

Zapdos raid hour starts on June 5 from 6 PM to 7 PM Local Time

Starts

Saturday, June 1, at 6 AM Local Time

Ends

Sunday, June 30, at 10 PM Local Time

Shiny Availability

Shiny Shadow Raikou is available

Ends

Wednesday, June 19, at 10 AM Local Time

Monday, June 10, at 10 AM Local Time

Ends

Wednesday, June 19, at 10 AM Local Time

Shiny Availability

Shiny Incarnate Forme Landorus is available

Raid Hour

Mega Charizard Y in Mega Raids

Mega Charizard Y Raids

Starts

Wednesday, June 19, at 10 AM Local Time

Ends

Friday, June 28, at 10 AM Local Time

Although there is a probability of a Shiny variant spanning after winning the raids, you should know that the Shiny encounter isn't guaranteed. You must win several Pokemon GO raids and encounter numerous Regular variants to match the Shiny odd. Keep in mind that getting a Mega, Shadow, Mythical, and Legendary Shiny Pokemon is extremely challenging.

item.title: Final Fantasy: 6 Most Selfless Characters In The Series, Ranked
item.description:
Highlights

  • Selflessness is a rare trait in the Final Fantasy franchise, but characters like Sazh, Ignis, and Cid prove it still exists.
  • Sazh is constantly looking out for others, Ignis sacrifices his sight for Noctis, and Cid fights to save slaves from oppression.
  • Tifa and Yuna also display immense selflessness through their willingness to protect others, even if it means personal sacrifice.

The Final Fantasy franchise contains its fair share of selfish characters, with the likes of Sephiroth, Kefka, and Ultimecia being just a few examples, but when it comes to individuals who are selfless, there's far less of them to choose from. Most of the Final Fantasy games are set in oppressive worlds where citizens are forced to fend for themselves, so finding someone who is willing to ignore their own needs for the sake of others is quite rare.

However, there have definitely been a few characters who have proven they aren't afraid to put their own wants and desires aside if it will benefit another person or even the world at large. There are plenty of reasons why these specific characters act so generously, but sadly, some of their selfless actions eventually come back to bite them later in the story.

6 Sazh (Final Fantasy 13)

A Desperate Father Whose Selflessness Can Often Get Him Into Trouble

Most of the party members in Final Fantasy 13 have a special someone they're trying to save during their journey. For Sazh, this person is his son, Dajh, whom he is willing to go to extreme lengths to meet once again after the two were separated at the hands of the Sanctum.

Despite this being Sazh's main objective, there are numerous occasions where he also helps the other party members achieve their goals. For example, when Snow attempts to dig Sarah out from the ground after she turns to crystal, Sazh is right there to help him. His selfless personality did end up backfiring on him, though, when it's revealed that Vanille, the young girl who he had been protecting, is the one who inadvertently turned Dajh into a L'Cie. Still, this doesn't take anything away from the fact that Sazh is a man who is always up for helping those around him, even if it isn't always the smartest decision.

5 Ignis (Final Fantasy 15)

Ignis Remains Loyal To Noctis, Even When His Life Is At Stake

Truthfully, Prompto and Gladiolus could also be considered selfless since they do everything they can to support Noctis during his adventure, but as Final Fantasy 15 goes on, it soon becomes apparent that it is Ignis who is truly willing to give up everything to help his friend reach his destination. At about the halfway point of the story, Ignis loses vision in both of his eyes after a fierce battle with Ardyn.

Rather than moaning or abandoning the crew to get some rest, he remains in the party to provide loyal support for Noctis as best as he still can. Seeing Ignis fight through the pain for the sake of his friends is truly heartbreaking, but it also proves he's more than willing to put his own problems aside for the sake of the group as a whole.

4 Cid (Final Fantasy 16)

Cid Would Rather Use His Underlying Powers To Save As Many Slaves As Possible

Though Cid is recognized as a Dominant who possesses the immense power of Ramuh, he doesn't use the summon to reign terror on the world, unlike some characters. Instead, Cid is dedicated to freeing the Dominants and Bearers from being used as nothing more than pawns. When he was the Lord Commander of Waloed's army, he even managed to establish a secret hideaway where he would rescue any Bearers who were being oppressed, despite how much he would lose if he was ever caught.

His undying passion for saving Bearers all started when Cid found out that his friend's son, Otto, was one of them, prompting him to start a movement where he would do all he could to free these unfortunate souls by any means necessary. He's also one of Clive's most loyal companions and is always willing to provide him with anything he needs throughout his journey.

3 Palom & Porom (Final Fantasy 4)

Despite Being So Young, Palom And Porom Decide To Put Their Lives On The Line For Their Allies

Palom and Porom are two young children who end up becoming the mages in the party in Final Fantasy 4 . Despite being so young and naive, these siblings prove on numerous occasions that they are dedicated to saving the world from Golbez in his pursuit of the crystals, but there's one particular scene that really emphasizes just how far they are willing to go to achieve this goal.

After two walls begin closing in on the party, Palom and Porom realize the only way to save their new-found friends is to give their own lives by turning into stone. Even though they are eventually cured and restored back to normal, the siblings had no idea that they would come back. They were willing to give up their short-lived lives for the greater good of the party, which is one of the most selfless acts ever seen in the series.

2 Tifa (Final Fantasy 7)

Tifa Gives Everything She Has To Protect Cloud From Tearing Himself Apart

At the beginning of Final Fantasy 7 , it's implied Tifa and Cloud are old friends who are reuniting for the first time after several years, but later in the game, this is revealed to not technically be true. In reality, Tifa found a disillusioned Cloud near a train station after his mental state collapsed upon witnessing the death of his friend Zack. At this point, Cloud had convinced himself that he was Zack to deal with his grief, and the one person who watched over him to ensure that Cloud's mental state didn't plummet even further was Tifa.

Throughout the game, Tifa is cautiously watching over Cloud, and though she does play along with his whole "Ex-Soldier" persona, the main thing she cares about is keeping him safe. This is only one example of Tifa's selfless nature, but another is when she begrudgingly decides to help AVALANCHE with their schemes, despite not really wanting to deep down. She believed that it would be the right thing to do for her and her friends, further demonstrating how selfless of a person she is.

1 Yuna (Final Fantasy 10)

Yuna Is Willing To Make The Ultimate Sacrifice For The Sake Of Spira

The world of Final Fantasy 10 is always under threat from the looming presence known as Sin, a giant monster that wreaks havoc on the world every few years. Thankfully, there is a way to at least delay Sin's attacks, but this can only be achieved by a Summoner who is capable of commanding the final Aeon. The catch, though, is that the Summoner will have to give their own life in order to protect the wider populace, which is something Yuna is perfectly content with.

Despite being only 17 years old, Yuna is still more than willing to sacrifice herself to protect the world from devastation, even though she knows Sin will inevitably return once again in the future. This heroic act does eventually start to affect Yuna, though, as seen when she bursts into tears upon realizing that she won't be able to be with Tidus anymore after the Pilgrimage ends. Yuna is as far from selfish as a video game character can be, and it's one of the many reasons why she has become such a fan-favorite party member from the Final Fantasy series.

item.title: Wuthering Waves: All Quiz Answers (Journal of Jinzhou & Quest of Wits)
item.description:
Quick Links

  • A Quest Of Wits Quiz Answers In Wuthering Waves
  • A Quest Of Wits 1 In Wuthering Waves
  • A Quest Of Wits 2 In Wuthering Waves
  • A Quest Of Wits 3 In Wuthering Waves
  • Journal of Jinzhou Quiz Answers In Wuthering Waves
  • Journal of Jinzhou: Vol.1 In Wuthering Waves
  • Journal of Jinzhou: Vol.2 In Wuthering Waves

When it comes to quiz answers in Wuthering Waves , two main quests come to mind; The Journal of Jinzhou and the Quest of Wits . Players have to talk with the NPC daily for a couple of days and answer all the questions correctly.

While some quests can be completed in Wuthering Waves by passing time via the main menu, the previously mentioned quests require a real-life day to pass to proceed.

A Quest Of Wits Quiz Answers In Wuthering Waves

A Quest of Wits is divided into three parts, where Quiz and Quwen will ask players one question each time. Fast travel to Wenye Beach Resonance Beacon to reach the location and head south. Jump down the hole and through the tunnel filled with flowers in Wuthering Waves to find the NPCs.

A Quest Of Wits 1 In Wuthering Waves

Here is the answer to the A Quest Of Wits 1 quest in Wuthering Waves :

Question

What is Jinhsi's job title?

Answer

Magistrate of Jinzhou

Rewards

  • Medium Resonance Potion x2
  • Medium Energy Core x2
  • Medium Sealed Tube x1
  • Shell Credit x3000

A Quest Of Wits 2 In Wuthering Waves

After one real day passes, head back to Quiz and answer his second question in Wuthering Waves .

Question

Who do you ask for peace?

Answer

Patrol Station

Rewards

  • Medium Resonance Potion x2
  • Medium Energy Core x2
  • Medium Sealed Tube x1
  • Shell Credit x3000

A Quest Of Wits 3 In Wuthering Waves

After another 24 hours, go to the Wenye Beach location in Wuthering Waves and answer the final question.

Question

Moon hanging from the trees, where can you find the blessings?

Answer

Violuna Banyan

Rewards

  • Union EXP x100
  • Astrite x10
  • Shell Credit x6000
  • Advanced Resonance Potion x2
  • Advanced Energy Core x1

Journal of Jinzhou Quiz Answers In Wuthering Waves

While exploring Jinzhou city, players will stumble upon two characters in Wuthering Waves , Girl (Xingzhu) and Female Instructor (Yingzhu), having a serious discussion just northeast of Jinzhou’s southern Resonance Beacon. Speak with the Girl to answer three questions.

Journal of Jinzhou: Vol.1 In Wuthering Waves

Once you answer the questions, the two NPCs will move to another location.

Question

Answer

What is the Sentinel of Jinzhou called?

Jue

Which department of Huaxu Academy is responsible for making Tacetite Weapons?

Department of Safety

Which of these isn't in the recipe for Spicy Pulled Chicken?

Caltrop

Rewards

Union EXP x20, Astrite x10, Medium Sealed Tube x2, Medium Energy Core x1

Journal of Jinzhou: Vol.2 In Wuthering Waves

After one day passes in real life, head to the bridge across the Synthesis store in Jinzhou city to find Xingzhu and her sister, Yingzhu. If you choose to speak with the former, you need to answer one question while choosing the latter makes you answer two questions. You can only choose one sister , but Resonators will earn the same rewards.

Yingzhu’s Questions

Question

Answer

What’s the official name for the Midnight Rangers fighting on the front lines?

Vanguards

What is the official name of the “gourds” Resonators in Huanglong all Carry?

Pangu Terminal

Rewards

Union EXP x20, Astrite x10, Medium Resonance Potion x2, Medium Energy Core x1, Credit x6000

Xingzhu’s Questions

Question

What plant is called the "Midnight Rangers' Friend" and can refresh the mind and body?

Answer

Noctemint

Rewards

  • Union EXP x20
  • Astrite x10
  • Medium Resonance Potion x2
  • Medium Energy Core x1
  • Shell Credit x6000
